attributes.action: Let Scotland Host Another Year Of Young People.
attributes.background: In 2018 Scotland’s National Year Was Year Of Young People. Over the period of the year young people in Scotland were given Ambassadorship to Lead the Year.  I Feel Other Young People Should Be Given The Chance To Shine Nationally, Globally & Worldwide

rejection.details:
This would the responsibility of the Scottish Government and not the UK Government and Parliament.

You can petition the Scottish Parliament here:

http://www.parliament.scot/gettinginvolved/petitions/
